item.title: Saavn Music Player for Windows
item.description: Welcome to the Saavn Music Player for Windows, an open-source desktop application that allows you to enjoy your favorite music seamlessly. This music player is powered by the Saavn API and built with Flutter, providing a robust and modern user experience. Features Seamless Music Playback: Enjoy high-quality music playback with an intuitive interface. Search and Discover: Use the Saavn API to search for your favorite songs, albums, and artists. Playlist Management: Create and manage your playlists easily. Rich Metadata: View detailed metadata for each track, including album art, artist information, and more.
